snippet: The businesses have been operating in a legal gray area under the limited economic changes begun by President Raúl Castro.
abstract: Cuban government clamps down on privately run cinemas and video game parlors that have grown popular on the island, saying the businesses are unauthorized and must close immediately.
lead_paragraph: The businesses have been operating in a legal gray area under the limited economic changes begun by President Raúl Castro.

headline.main: Cuba to Close Private Venues for Movies and Video Games
headline.print_headline: Cuba to Close Private Venues For Movies and Video Games
